text_cli_en: glacier or dead iche covered by till
in situ alteration or weahtering cover
conglomerate, breccia (psephite: grain size: gravel, boulder and block)
text_cli_de: Konglomerat, Brekzie (Psephit: Korngrösse: Kies, Steine und Blöcke)

text_cli_en: siltstone, claystone, marlstone (pelite: grain size: silt and clay)
text_cli_de: Silt-, Tonstein, Mergel (Pelit: Silt- u. Tonkorngrösse)

text_cli_en: tuffite (pyroclastic and non-volcanic sediments, 75-25% pyroclastic components)
kakirite (strongly shattered and sliced, ± without cohesion)
cataclasite (with larger fragments of neighbouring rock, mainly brittle deformation)
text_cli_de: Kataklasit (mit grösseren Bruchstücken des Nebengesteins, vorwiegend spröd deformiert)

text_cli_en: mylonite undifferenciated (dynamic recristallisation, banded, ductile deformation)
text_cli_de: Mylonit undifferenziert (dynamisch rekristallisiert, gebändert, duktil deformiert)

text_cli_en: rock resulting from regional- or contact metamorphism
gneiss (splitting in cm- or dm sized plates)
text_cli_de: Gneis (in cm- bis dm-dicke Platten spaltend)
